      Constructors in de.coreengine.rendering.model with parameters of type Material 
      Constructor and Description
      Model(VertexArrayObject vao, IndexBuffer[] indexBuffers, Material[] materials, com.bulletphysics.collision.shapes.CollisionShape shape)
      Creating new model with all parameters if indexBuffer count is less the materials count then superfluous materials will be deleted if indexBuffer count is greater the materials count then missing materials will be added if a material is null then material is set to a default material
